name: TecnoTupã
description:
The envoyed by Tupã must empower his god throught altars, to supress chaos caused by Anhangá. 

This is a roombased roguelike, the player have to explore the sacred dungeon and defeat enemies to find the altar of each floor to progress. Each altar unleashes the power of a different indigenous god, revitalizing nature and consequently making bestial enemies from fauna and Anhangás jackals. The hero need to activate three of many divine altars before activating the last one, referring Tupã.

Note: TecnoTupã was made for  Game Jam+ 2020. It's a prototype and does not represent the full game version

CONTROLS:

Direcional ou A,W,S,D - Move

Shift - Roll

Mouse - Aim 

Botão esquerda do mouse - Shoot
